author: poojaranjan
content: Hi <@!489256758989029405> , yes we're planning to have the author(s), (at least one) client implementer & if possible someone from user (wallet). Targeting it for early to mid March. Thanks for creating the issue, we will keep updating it as we receive confirmation.
